long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automaise Support Genius for Service Cloud is an AI-based tool designed to maximize the productivity of customer service agents & improve support efficiency. This intelligent solution requires no integrations and frees the agents from a wide range of time consuming but relevant tasks.
Support Genius Lite seamlessly integrates with any CRM, providing case classification & sentiment analyses, real-time smart scripting, intelligent answer suggestions, Next-Best-Action recommendations, the ability to gather missing information, and more.

Know more: https://automaise.com/support-genius-lite/ 
Talk to us: https://automaise.com/contact-us/
